content: B36 9.0 36V Battery Ultimate-power 36V 9.0 Ah Li-ion battery for extreme run time ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Batteries, chargers, and power stations- - - ### FEATURES:Features Up to 100% longer run time than the B36 5.2 battery, for corded performance on heavy and serial applications with all 36V tools Includes Hilti Cordless Power Care (CPC) technology – on-board processors monitor each battery cell to deliver more reliable, consistent and longer-lasting power on your jobsites Fully sealed electronics for increased protection against dust, humidity and water Rubberized, glass-fiber reinforced casing – up to four times more resistant to damage from dropping and twice as resistant to extreme temperatures than standard ABS plastic Casing designed to cool the battery to the ideal temperature for faster charging Applications Compatible with all Hilti 36V cordless tools Compatible with all Hilti C4/36 Li-ion chargers Applications in extreme temperature conditions – from 60° C (140° F) down to -17° C (1.4° F) All demanding applications requiring corded power and extreme run time For production work that would normally require the use of a corded tool ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight: 4.48 lb. Dimensions (LxWxH): 7.1 x 3.9 x 4.1 in Working temperature range: 1 - 140 °F Technical Data | Weight | 4.48 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 7.1 x 3.9 x 4.1 in | Working temperature range | 1 - 140 °F ### ITEMS- 2183172 - 36 volt 9.0 ah lithium ion battery - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x B 36/9.0 Battery pack
